Title: Defeat of Hankou
Designer: Osaka Asahi Shimbun (大阪朝日新聞)
Publisher: Osaka Asahi Shimbun (大阪朝日新聞)
Notes: Poster produced in Japan.The Osaka Asahi Shimbun was the former title of the Japanese daily newspaper Asahi Shimbun, which still exists. The poster is an advertisment, in which images are promised of the defeat of Hankou (1938).
